channel.title: R on Mackenzie's Blog Post
channel.description: Recent content in R on Mackenzie's Blog Post

item.title: Don't want your bike stolen? Paint it Green!
item.description: Abstract Bike theft has been an on-going issue in City of Toronto. In this paper we explore 2014-2019 bike theft data from Toronto Police Service. We find the trend for Toronto bike theft occurrence in regards of time, color of the bike, and location. Our findings have implications for preventing bike theft in Toronto for individuals, and the city as a whole. Introduction Do you bike to places in Toronto?
